author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the grill to high. Criss-cross the mango flesh, then turn the mango half inside out to make a 'hedgehog' shape. Sprinkle over the chopped chilli, mixed spice and honey. Place the mango onto a baking sheet then place under the grill for 2-3 minutes. To serve, place the mango onto a plate.
ingredients: ½ mango ,  ½ chilli, finely chopped ,  ½ tsp mixed spice,  1 tbsp runny honey
